metadata.dc:author: Pinos Paul, M A
Grasa Lanau, V
Sebastián Borruel, J L

Jiménez Calvo, J
Lozano Uruñuela, F
Millán Serrano, J A
De Pablo Cárdenas, A
Jiménez Aristu, J
metadata.dc:description: We show our experience about iatrogenic damage of colon secondarily to percutaneous surgery of the kidney. One of them treated by means of open surgery, the other by conservative procedures. Making discussion on risk factors, as well as the diagnostic therapeutical aspects.
metadata.dc:title: Perforación colónica en la cirugía renal percutánea. Presentación de dos casos.
[Colonic perforation in percutaneous surgery of the kidney. Report of two cases].
